content: That's a good question. I think my WhatsApp usage will probably stay at a higher level for a while, at least until I get back into my regular routine. As for new connections, I have been more active on Twitter lately, and I've started following some influencers in the fitness niche. I've even had a productive conversation with one of them, exchanging around 12 messages about her workout routine. Speaking of productive conversations, I had another one on Telegram with some colleagues from work, where we exchanged around 70 messages that day, and I was impressed with how quickly we were able to resolve some of the issues we were facing.
